column4: Hi, I am new to linux, I just downloaded the ubuntu 6.06 CD, would like to install it on a partition along with Windows XP pro. are there any issues with this, one of my friends had a few so he aborted the installation
there should be no problem, just make sure you do the "edit partitions manually" and not use the entire disk
do you have any questions or specific worries?
no problem, and if I am not around when you get back I am sure people will help you
